It's Me Sedra Al Mountaha

Graphic designer from Aleppo, Syria Welcome to my portfolio My name is Sedra Al Mountaha I obtained a diploma in Network Engineering from the University of Aleppo Informatics engineering student. Specializing in Building visual identities and Branding. Practicing graphic design for 4 years, in areas ranging from advertising, printing and marketing campaigns. And trained in design programs for 2 years.

img!

More About Me

Brian Do holds a bachelor's degree in Graphic Design from a prestigious university in the United States and has a relentless drive for staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and design trends. Actively involved in the design community, Brian regularly participates in diverse design conferences and meetups. When he's not immersed in design work, he finds solace in playing the guitar and exploring new coffee shops in his local area. Brian firmly believes in maintaining a healthy work-life balance, making sure to take breaks and reenergize his creativity. In his spare time, he also volunteers at a local animal shelter on weekends.
